title: Independence to Exile: The Catalan Politician Seeking Refuge in Scotland
description:
Five months have now passed since the Spanish Government suspended Catalonia's autonomy and imposed direct rule.  The move came in response to the region's declaration of independence which followed on from a ninety percent yes vote in a violence-marred referendum which Spain ruled illegal.   
Days after the independence declaration, the ousted Catalan President and four of his ministers fled to Brussels to escape legal charges. One of the ministers Professor Clara Ponsati has now returned to her previous job at St Andrews University's School of Economics.  From there she spoke to Scotland Tonight. 

Don't forget to subscribe to our YouTube channel and download the STV News App: https://stv.click/11de0 

Watch more from STV News on the STV Player: https://stv.click/stvplef4ee 

Find us on social media here: 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stvnews

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stv.news/
